message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $15,000 to us. However, to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
